body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open Magarena 1.43 (1.42 works fine)
2. New duel, Load deck
3. Click on any folder in the file selection window.

What is the expected output? 
Folder selected. After double click - go to folder.

What do you see instead?
Crash. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.43 on Win7 64-bit If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). CRASH REPORT FOR MAGARENA THREAD Thread[AWT-EventQueue-0,6,main]
CREATED ON 2013/10/31 22:34:43
MAGARENA VERSION 1.43, JRE 1.7.0_45, OS Windows 7_6.1 x86

Exception from controller.runGame: null
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
	at magic.data.FileIO.toStr(FileIO.java:56)
	at magic.ui.viewer.DeckDescriptionPreview.loadDescription(DeckDescriptionPreview.java:41)
	at magic.ui.viewer.DeckDescriptionPreview.propertyChange(DeckDescriptionPreview.java:70)
	at java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport.fire(Unknown Source)
	at java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport.firePropertyChange(Unknown Source)

author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: Crash when selecting a folder while loading a deck

comments.body: Issue 274 has been merged into this issue.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open Magarena 1.43 (1.42 works fine)
2. New duel, Load deck
